page.title: 15MISCELLANEOUS FACTS
page.content:
The nearest{Doctors' Surgery}is in WOOL.There are 3 Doctors.A Doctor comes out twice a week,on Wednesdays and Fridays and holds a Surgery in West Lulworth Village Hall.
There is a small{Telephone Exchange (for West Lulworth)in Farm Lane.It has an annual overhaul and a weekly check. Lulworth has{3 Telephone Boxes.}There is also 1 at Durdle Door Caravan Park.
There is a small{Sub Post Office }at Bishops Cottage Gift Shop,Beach Road. There are{4 Post Boxes}in Lulworth.(We also have a Victorian Post Box,not in use,by the Bus Shelter.)There are 2 collections,Mon_Fri;but only 1 on Sat, from WAREHAM,our main Post Office.
The{Library Van}calls once a week.
